shows.title: Why Do Christians Idolise the Traditional Family?
shows.desc:
How did Christians arrive at an odd combination of Old Testament patriarchy, New Testament urgency, Tudor machinations, Victorian purity, and the 1950s model of respectable breadwinner-led family as the God-ordained ideal? What’s the future of Christian family and relationships?

Vicky Walker is a writer, speaker and broadcaster fascinated by modern relationships. Her latest book looks at how faith and personal relationships intersect.
